li.label: low expectations
li.description: This place is pretty poor. I can't expect much comforts when there aren't any to be had.

li.label: very low expectations
li.description: This place is poverty-stricken. I better steel myself to survive.

li.label: high expectations
li.description: This place is doing well. I ought to be treated well here.

li.label: very high expectations
li.description: This place is downright rich. I see no reason I should be denied anything here.

li.label: hungry
li.description: I haven't eaten in a while.

li.label: urgently hungry
li.description: The hunger pangs are clawing my insides. I need food or I'll starve soon.

li.label: starving
li.description: I just want something - anything - to eat. I can feel my body wasting away. It hurts...

li.label: tired
li.description: I haven't slept in a while.

li.label: very tired
li.description: I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...

li.label: exhausted
li.description: I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...

li.label: ugly environment
li.description: This place is unpleasant to be in.

li.label: very ugly environment
li.description: This place is really unpleasant. I don't want to be here.

li.label: hideous environment
li.description: This place is unbearable. Get me out of here...

li.label: pleasant environment
li.description: This place is nice.

li.label: very pleasant environment
li.description: I really like this place. It's beautiful.

li.label: beautiful environment
li.description: This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.

li.label: cramped environment
li.description: This place is really closed-in. I feel like I have no space to breathe.

li.label: very cramped environment
li.description: It's claustrophobic in here. I have nowhere to move. I feel like a rat in a tiny cage.

li.label: spacious interior
li.description: This is a really comfortably open indoor space.

li.label: in darkness
li.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.

li.label: cabin fever (mild)
li.description: I've been cooped up inside for days. I need to get outside.

li.label: cabin fever (serious)
li.description: I've been trapped like a rat in here for so long. I desperately need to get outside!

li.label: wearing frayed apparel
li.description: My clothes are looking pretty bad. Can't I get something decent to wear?

li.label: wearing tattered apparel
li.description: I'm wearing a tattered piece of trash. Can't I get something decent to wear?

li.label: sick
li.description: I don't feel very well, I'm sick.

li.label: cold
li.description: I'm uncomfortably cold.

li.label: very cold
li.description: I'm so cold. Shivering. Can't get warm.

li.label: freezing
li.description: My teeth are chatting so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.

li.label: hot
li.description: This heat is unpleasant. I'm sweating.

li.label: very hot
li.description: I'm really overheated.

li.label: extremely hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.

li.label: burning up
li.description: I'm burning up. I think I could die from this heat!
